alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A CLUSTER OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHENANGO...TIOGA... BROOME...AND DELAWARE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A cluster of heavy snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 420 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from South Danby to near Coventry and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Kirkwood, Conklin, Maine, Sidney, Owego, and Sanford. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 8. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 64 and 84, and between 87A and 90. Interstate 88 between 1 and 9. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Though roads are generally warm and wet, which will resist accumulation, visibility may rapidly drop to below a quarter mile. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
